snippet.title: H7N9: Is This Flu Something to Worry About? | CDC Features
snippet.description: * H7N9: Is This Flu Something to Worry About? | CDC Features * A new bird flu virus, called H7N9 for short, is causing serious illness in people in China. Currently there is no ongoing person-to-person spread. ... * www.cdc.gov/Features/h7n9flu/
